MAC_RLC_MEAS_DESC Struct Reference
[OpenAirInterface MESH L2/L3 Interfaces]

Detailed Description

This primitive parametrizes a MAC measurement process.

Data Fields

MAC_MEAS_T Meas_trigger
 Thresholds to trigger event driven measurement reports.
MAC_AVG_T Mac_avg
 Set of forgetting factors for the averaging of the MAC measurement process.
unsigned int bo_forgetting_factor
 Forgetting factor for RLC buffer occupancy averaging.
unsigned int sdu_loss_trigger
 Trigger for RLC sdu losses.
unsigned short Rep_amount
 Number of Measurements for this process, 0 means infinite.
unsigned short Rep_interval
 Reporting interval between successive measurement reports in this process.

Field Documentation

MAC_AVG_T MAC_RLC_MEAS_DESC::Mac_avg

Set of forgetting factors for the averaging of the MAC measurement process.

Trigger for RLC sdu losses.

Number of Measurements for this process, 0 means infinite.

unsigned short MAC_RLC_MEAS_DESC::Rep_interval

Reporting interval between successive measurement reports in this process.
